title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Simulation-Based Large-Scale Online Course Design: Self-Directed

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and foundational knowledge in social studies education
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design self-directed learning-promoting content structures (weekly modules, learning pathways) when developing MOOCs.
Learners can conceptualize feedback systems to enhance learner-content interaction in simulation/VR environments.
Learners can plan smartphone-based learning activities and produce project deliverables in limited-technology environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
